mapper.insert: insert into nurse_info (ID, NAME, PRICE, DESCIBE, FLAG, STATUS, LEVEL) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{descibe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update nurse_info set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCIBE = #{descibe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
